text: (Kumbuchilani) katema kaŵannosyisye Allah ŵanganyao kulugono kwenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ali ŵannono, mwanti akannosye ali ŵajinji, chisimu nkatengwiche ŵanganyammwe ni nkakanganile pakutaŵana nganisyo (syakumenyana nao), nambo kuti Allah ŵan'goosile (jenumanja). Chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwakumanyilila yaili m’mitima
